Vaccines are carcinogens and poisonous. 60% of American adults and 50% of the children have a lifelong chronic disease (includes allergies, asthma). Vaxx companies pay max 250k per injured child and they've paid out +$4billion to date in damages. Vaccines are the savior of the failing pharmaceutical industry. We can take back our health through diet, exercise and natural supplements, but a PLANdemic emerges everyone wants drugs and vaccines because the media and the big pharma doctors told them to. Your body is incredible at keeping you healthy. You just need to be responsible and feed it right, especially vitamin D.
